activities:
MoonFire Corporation is a provider of customer interation management software 
for non-profits and higher education organizations.  All data is stored locally 
in the UK and no data is saved in the US.  MoonFire support personelle will 
access UK data via remote desktop or web interface directly to the server 
located in the UK.  Personal information is not used, sold or retransmitted 
other than for its original purpose.
recoursemech:
If a complaint or dispute cannot be resolved through our internal process, we 
agree to dispute resolution using the European Union Data Protection 
Authorities (DPAs) as a third party resolution provider.  The MoonFire will 
cooperate with the DPAs in the investigation and resolution of complaints 
brought under the Safe Harbor.  MoonFire will comply with any advice given by 
the DPAs where the DPAs take the view that the organization needs to take 
specific action to comply with Safe Harbor Principles.
